title.rendered: Sure Oak Announced as a 2021 Local Excellence Award Winner by UpCity!

content.rendered:
At Sure Oak, our passion is driven by a vision of the world where all humans reach their full potential. With critical expertise and the power of search and technology, we help our clients stand out from the crowd in some of the most competitive markets in the world.

Our mission is to design strategies that not only make an immediate and meaningful impact but also foster long-term value. We are all about growth —  business and personal —, building genuine relationships, and helping clients reach their goals and dreams.

For more than a decade, UpCity’s mission is to help businesses find B2B service providers they can trust. The UpCity Recommendability Rating was developed to determine a service provider’s credibility and recommendability, giving UpCity the confidence to recommend them to the more than 1.5 million businesses that visit their site.

Each year, UpCity analyzes and scores more than 70,000 service providers based on their UpCity Recommendability Rating, and acknowledges the top national and local providers with an UpCity Excellence Award. The award acknowledges that the recipients have displayed exemplary recommendability, trust, and integrity over the last year.

The results are in, and we won!

We are ecstatic to announce that Sure Oak has been recognized as one of the top B2B service providers of 2021 in the New York City area by UpCity!

Mark Tepper, SVP of Sales & Customer Success at UpCity, had this to say about Sure Oak:

“The Sure Oak team is highly skilled in a wide variety of marketing disciplines. The work they do is remarkable, but what stands out to me is the heart they put into every project. It’s that extra touch, that extra attention to detail that drives real success for their customers. Congratulations!”

– Mark Tepper, SVP of Sales & Customer Success

This recognition has been driven in large part by our 5.0-star review rating on UpCity. Here are a few of our favorite pieces of feedback we’ve received from our incredible customers:

“Sure Oak did a great job for us. I was impressed with how frequently they updated me on their progress. Plan to use them again.”

– Joseph Mandour, Sure Oak customer

“Great experience working with the Sure Oak team! They know their stuff and it shows through the positive results delivered.”

– Joel Alvarez, Sure Oak customer

Thank you to UpCity for this wonderful honor, and thank you to our customers who have grown with us and supported us over the years. We look forward to our continued partnership and are excited for what’s ahead!

excerpt.rendered: Sure Oak was awarded a 2021 Local Excellence Award as a top B2B service provider in the New York area from Upcity.
